title: Cloudy Apple Juice

ingredients.content: 400 g apples, unpeeled, cored and quartered (approx. 3 apples)

preparations.content: Place apples, sugar, water, lemon and ice in mixing bowl then blend <b>2 min/speed 10<b>. Serve immediately or strain through a fine sieve then serve.

hintsAndTricks: For a cool drink, add a few ice cubes before blending.
